title: Back up OMT data before upgrade
content:
Before an OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT) upgrade, back up OMT by using one of the following methods.

The method of using VM snapshots is for on-premises deployments only.

Back up OMT by taking VM snapshots

  1. Take a snapshot of each of the control plane nodes and worker nodes. For details, see the "Take a snapshot of the suite" topic.
  2. Back up the OMT database. For details, refer to the specific database documentation.
  3. Back up the exported OMT core NFS volume. For example: /var/vols/itom/itsma/core.

Back up OMT manually

For details, see Back up OMT manually.
